meanings.definition: A specialized cell transmitting nerve impulses.
meanings.sent1: The neurone carries messages from the brain to the body.
meanings.sent2: The neurone in the spinal cord helps us move our legs.
meanings.sent3: The neurone decided to take a break and stop sending signals.
meanings.sent4: Her neurone was like a busy messenger, never resting.
meanings.sent5: The neurone is like a tiny messenger, delivering important news.

meanings.sent1: I learned about the neurone in science class.
meanings.sent2: The neurone sends signals throughout the body.
meanings.sent3: The neurone threw a party for all the other cells.
meanings.sent4: His neurone was a superhero, always ready to save the day.
meanings.sent5: The neurone is like a tiny worker, constantly busy.
